narrative.supportNeeded: Rate negotiation remains the #1 blocker — board has pushed back on costs and rates (per SF nextStep 02/18). A 30-min business case call with Eleanor (FD) and Tom (CTO) took place on Feb 20 but full transcript was not captured, so outcome of rate/cost discussion is unknown. Follow-up needed to confirm: (1) whether rate concerns were addressed or narrowed, (2) whether board-ready TCO materials were reviewed, (3) next steps Eleanor/board need. Additional support still needed: Irish entity guidance (Ben Homer international docs), Arttov architecture clarity, implementation timeline to hit Christmas 2026 go-live.

questions.notes: Eleanor (FD) engaged on Feb 20 biz case call (30 min, with Tom). Board pushback on costs confirmed in SF notes. Full transcript not captured — cannot confirm whether true EB / final approver was identified.
questions.action: Follow up with Tom/Eleanor to confirm: did Feb 20 call clarify who gives final sign-off?

questions.notes: Feb 20 biz case call with Eleanor happened as planned (positive engagement signal). Transcript only captured opening pleasantries. Cannot confirm whether deeper access was achieved.
questions.action: Debrief with Ben Rees on what was covered in Feb 20 biz case call. Did Eleanor commit to any next steps or board presentation?

questions.notes: SF nextStep confirms board cares about costs and rates. Feb 20 biz case call with Eleanor likely addressed this, but transcript not captured.
questions.action: Debrief Ben Rees: what does Eleanor/board care about most beyond rates? Capture specific objections.

questions.notes: Payments central issue throughout. Feb 20 biz case call almost certainly covered rates/payments given SF nextStep + call title. Maintaining Yes.
questions.action: Confirm with Ben Rees: did Feb 20 result in movement on rate agreement? Were revised rates presented?

questions.notes: Rack rates presented; final rates not agreed. Feb 20 biz case call likely discussed rates but transcript not captured.
questions.action: Debrief Ben Rees urgently: were revised rates discussed on Feb 20? What was Eleanor's response? Path to agreement?

questions.notes: Already on Shopify Plus D2C — POS is only native unification option. Call happened, maintaining Yes. FD investing 30 min on biz case is positive signal.
questions.action: Confirm with Ben Rees: did unified commerce value prop resonate with Eleanor?

questions.notes: Tom facilitated Eleanor's presence on Feb 20 biz case call (champion delivering access to decision-makers). Cannot confirm if broader buying committee was discussed.
questions.action: Debrief Ben Rees: did Tom or Eleanor name the board-level approver? Any commitment to introduce Shopify to the board?

questions.notes: Win factors well established. Feb 20 call happened. Maintaining Yes — competitive positioning unchanged.
questions.action: Confirm with Ben Rees: any new competitive threats surfaced? Competitive brief ready for board?

newCalls.title: Ben x Eleanor - Biz Case
